book.witchery.guidebook.brazier.name: 火盆
book.witchery.guidebook.brewing.beginnin: For when you want more effects
book.witchery.guidebook.brewing.name: 酿造
book.witchery.guidebook.general.name: General
book.witchery.guidebook.general.owl.name: 猫头鹰
book.witchery.guidebook.potions.name: 药水s
book.witchery.guidebook.ritual.name: 仪式s
book.witchery.guidebook.ritual.necro_sto: One step closer to the grave
book.witchery.guidebook.vampirism.name: Vampirism
brazier.brazier.page.1: A Witches tool to burn ingredients with flint and steel, or a fire charge.
brazier.potion.page.1: Burning potions with wooden ash is an easy way to make the effect linger. Not as portable as a Lingering potion, but far easier to get.
brazier.summon.page.1: Burning a set of specific ingredients, we can call the dead to later bind to an effigy for unique, and maybe deadly, effects.
brewing.beginning_potions.page.1: 自定义 potions are made in a lit 巫师炼药锅 access to an 祭坛 with sufficient power depending on the resources used. The first ingredient must be a Nether Wart. Other than 祭坛 Power, 药水s require Capacity to increase the amount of ingredients the potion can hold.
brewing.beginning_potions.page.2: Stronger ingredients require more altar power to successfully mix.
brewing.brew_of_flowing_spirit.page.1: Can only be made in the Spirit World. Throw to make a fluid which applies regeneration to anyone bathing in it. Throw it on double doors in the Spirit World to make a Spirit Portal. Rite of Manifestation required to enter it
brewing.brew_of_frost.page.1: Freezes water and makes entities chilly
brewing.brew_of_love.page.1: Makes Animals go into spontaneous labour
brewing.brew_of_raising.page.1: Raises one dead from the dirt
brewing.brew_of_revealing.page.1: Used to remove Invisibility effects on entities. Makes Spectral Creatures easier to see.
brewing.brew_of_sleeping.page.1: Enter the Spirit world in your dreams, beware of your surroundings and to avoid a nightmare, use dream weavers, wispy cotton and flowing spirit nearby.
brewing.cauldron.page.1: A vessel most vital for the crafting of 精酿s, 药水s, and Witching Wares. Must be filled with Water and set o’er Flame. Oft’ it doth require an 祭坛 nearby. A pinch of 木灰 shall cleanse its humours. Should thy brew turn brown, beware—'tis likely spoiled, lest the hue be true to thine ingredients.
brewing.flying_ointment.page.1: An oil of wind and wings. Imbue your broom and soar high.
brewing.ghost_of_the_light.page.1: A pale brew born of spirits lost to the light. Stir it well, for it whispers secrets from the shadows.
brewing.potion_capacity.page.1: After the Nether Wart has been added the potion starts without any capacity. And since most ingredients cost capacity, capacity modifiers should be added first, but not limited to first. Potent ingredients might require more than one capacity.
brewing.potion_capacity.title: 精酿 Capacity
brewing.potion_effect.page.1: Once the brew holds capacity, ingredients may bestow their magick. Each carries a tale, each a tincture. Choose wisely, for not all gifts are kind. Most potions needs to be thrown
brewing.ritual_chalk.page.1: The standard ritual chalk, no special alignment.
brewing.spirit_of_otherwhere.page.1: A strange concoction that binds the essence of those who roam beyond. Drink deep, and feel the weight of distant worlds.
general.beginning.page.1: All witchery begins with the green. Break thee the wild grass, and the earth shall gift thee seeds most curious and rare.
general.breath_of_the_goddess.page.1: A sacred fume drawn from the boughs of the Birch or Cherry, when touched by fire most gentle. 'Tis said the very breath of the Goddess herself lingers in its vapour.
general.cauldron.page.1: A vessel most vital for the crafting of 精酿s, 药水s, and Witching Wares. Must be filled with Water and set Aflame. Often require an 祭坛 nearby. A pinch of 木灰 will cleanse its humours.
general.critter_snare.page.1:
Small 史莱姆s, 蝙蝠s and 蠹虫 will be trapped in this plant.
\
\
Require four 赤杨树苗s, Water, Cobweb and a Zombie.
general.distillery.page.1: Herein lies the art of separation. By fire’s kiss and alchemical glass, one may draw forth the true soul of a mixture, layer by layer.
general.exhale_of_the_horned_one.page.1: This fume is born of the wild woods, where the Horned Lord treads. Burn the wood of oak or dark oak, and if the night be right, the smoke shall bear his mark.
general.fume_expansion.page.1: With a maximum of two, one on each side of the Oven, this will increase the output chance of Fumes
general.grassper.page.1:
Can be used to hold items for rituals.
\
\
Require four grass, one chest and one water.
general.hint_of_rebirth.page.1: The faintest whisper of life renewed. Found only in the last breath of dying spruce or the smoulder of young jungle green.
general.mutandis.page.1: Evil Scrambled Eggs. Used on Plants to mutate them into other plants, the mutations will be locked to the same type of plant for a few seconds on use, so for example saplings will turn into other saplings if used continually on the same sapling.
general.mutating_spring.page.1: Can create 擒拿草s, 生物陷阱s, 苦艾, 寄生虱 and 猫头鹰s. And convert some blocks into other.
general.oven.page.1: By fire and fume, the Oven doth turn Saplings to Essences. With Jars in place, the Spirits are caught, else they vanish into the aether.
general.owl.page.1:
Familiar, quite stupid but grants better control over broom when bound.
\
\
Require three 超级转生粉, one Charges 调谐之石, Water, Wolf, Cobweb and one Critter snare with a bat for each 猫头鹰.
general.parasitic_louse.page.1:
Can be picked up, has the ability to store and apply a 药水. Use potion on louse to apply it. has a chance to consume the potion on attacking a creature.
\
\
Require Two 转生粉, One 狗之舌, one Charged 调谐之石 and one 生物陷阱 with a 蠹虫. Water and Lily pads.
general.tear_of_the_goddess.page.1: Distilled sorrow and soft mercy. The Tear is not wept in vain, but drawn from sacred blooms under moonlight, when the air is thick with longing.
general.wormwood.page.1:
Used mostly in necromancy and brazier.
\
\
Require Wheat, four 纤细棉花 and Four Water.

potion_effect.blaze_powder: Brings strength like fire, fierce and fleeting.
potion_effect.ent_twig: Grows a tree. Can pick sapling from inventory
potion_effect.fermented_spider_eye: Good to bad and bad to good
potion_effect.fermented_spider_eye.title: Inverse Effect
potion_effect.glistering_melon_slice: Restores the flesh with golden sweetness.
potion_effect.spider_eye: A cursed touch, brings poison with a glance.
potion_effect.wheat_seeds: Plants seed items on the ground on tilled land
ritual.apply_ointment.page.1: Infuse the 扫帚 with flying powers
ritual.bind_familiar.page.1: Cats, 猫头鹰s and Frogs. All with unique powers while bound. Cats amplify rites and curses. 猫头鹰s increases 扫帚 manoeuvrability. Frogs increase chance of extra brewed potions.
ritual.bind_spectral_creatures.page.1: Binds spectral creatures like Spirit, 报丧女妖, 幽魂 and Poltergeist to an 塑像, like a 稻草人, 黏土塑像 or 女巫之阶.
ritual.charge_attuned.page.1: Charges an attuned stone, this charge is required by some recipes and rituals, can also replace 祭坛 Power up to 3000.
ritual.golden_chalk.page.1: The center block in a ritual circle, surround with items either on ground or on a 擒拿草. Rightclick to activate the ritual
ritual.infernal_chalk.page.1: 炼狱粉笔 channels the power of the underworld.
ritual.infuse_otherwhere.page.1: User can teleport with a witches hand
ritual.manifestation.page.1: Enables a player to walk through a spirit portal
ritual.otherwhere_chalk.page.1: Imbued with the essence of distant realms.
ritual.push_mobs.page.1: Mobs will be pushed away from the ritual center
ritual.rite_of_charging_infusion.page.1: Replenishes the infused players power during the duration of the rite.
ritual.ritual_chalk.page.1: The standard ritual chalk, no special alignment.
ritual.set_midnight.page.1: Manipulate the celestial bodies to make day into night.
ritual.summon_demon.page.1: Summons a fierce 恶魔 which will drop a 恶魔之心, an incredibly valuable resource
ritual.summon_spectral_pig.page.1: Summons a 幽魂猪 which will drop 幽魂粉末, a valuable resource
ritual.summon_wither.page.1: Its the wither what can i say
ritual.teleport_owner_to_waystone.page.1: Sends the user to the location of the waystone
spirit_world.brew_of_flowing_spirit.page: Can only be made in the Spirit World. Throw to make a fluid which applies regeneration to anyone bathing in it. Throw it on double doors in the Spirit World to make a Spirit Portal. Rite of Manifestation required to enter it
spirit_world.disturbed_cotton.page.1: This nightmare warps and twists the 纤细棉花 to become... Disturbed..
spirit_world.dream_weaver_of_fasting.pag: A strange brew for the soul, fasting in sleep will still the hunger within, leaving you calm when the dawn breaks
Swift as the wind, this spirit will carry you swiftly through the waking world, like a whisper in the breeze.
spirit_world.dream_weaver_of_iron_arm.pa: The iron arm of slumber. Rest as if your body were bound by steel, and awaken with unyielding strength.
Born of shadow and fear, this weaver binds nightmares into the night. May it grant you peace when the dark calls.
spirit_world.hunger.page.1: Kill your 梦魇 to acquire, can be brought between dream and reality.
spirit_world.wispy_cotton.page.1: A delicate weave from the fabric of dreams. To hold it is to hold the softness of slumber itself
vampirism.armor.page.1:
\
Increased comfort will make all the difference. Use 骨针 to stain wool
vampirism.cane.page.1: Can collect blood with each hit, stored in the cane to be drunk whenever.
vampirism.sun_collector.page.1: Place in the sun and put a 石英球 on it to collect the sunlight
vampirism.vamp_1.page.1:
\
\
It is with some reluctance I commit these observations to paper, for what I have witnessed is not for the weak of mind. Instead, take my words as a warning.
vampirism.vamp_1.page.2:
\
\
...he was reminiscing over dinner this evening about his "birth", a demonic pact of sorts...
\
\
\
\
 ..butchering a chicken over a skull with an 仪祭匕首 and holding a glass goblet to collect the blood is barbaric," I told him...
vampirism.vamp_1.page.3:
\
\
...apparently start of a long forgotten rite 
\
\
\
\
\
 ..night, open to the moon, chalk, candles and skull
vampirism.vamp_1.page.4:
\
\
\
\
...pouring the blood onto the skull... 
\
\
\
\
 ..mumbling about taking her to the underworld
vampirism.vamp_1.page.5:
\
\
...proving his worth to her... 
\
\
\
\
\
\
\
\
\
 ..that glass goblet again, could someone really drink such a thing? ...
vampirism.vamp_2.page.1:
\
\
...Today, or should I say this evening, he told me about his first kill...
\
\
\
\
 ...the thirst that first night, he said, was overwhelming, he had to fully sait hes hunger...
vampirism.vamp_3.page.1:
\
...he found he was able to transfix his victims...
\
\
\
... was now able to drink as he needed without others realizing, so long as he did not drain more than half...\
\
\
\
\
 ...did so, from five oblivious souls...
vampirism.vamp_4.page.1:
\
...strength was flowing into him, the more he drank, as the nights progressed, the stronger he became...
\
\
\
\
 ...it was on the forth night after his mastery of drinking that the world slowed down...
vampirism.vamp_5.page.1:
\
...his greatest foe, the sun, was ever present, tormenting and instantly deadly to him...
\
\
\
\
\
 ...became his obsession... ...found a way to collect sunlight and burnt himself with it ten times during the night...
vampirism.vamp_6.page.1:
\
\
...first walk in the sun after his rebirth brought him to bloody tears, he felt his blood burning, but no longer instantly...
\
\
\
\
 ...he needed more strength, and extinguishing creatures of pure fire was his solution... ...twenty died.
vampirism.vamp_7.page.1:
\
...he could smash solid stone, but bound to the earth, however fast, he was still limited...
\
\
 ...he called in Her once more, repeating the rite of his rebirth...\
\
 ...gifted Her a flower, the color of the blood She so craves...
vampirism.vamp_8.page.1:
\
\
...he smiled, a rare event, when he told me of his first flight...
\
\
\
\
\
 ...he flew from village to village, until he knew the full extent of his domain, there was now nowhere he could not go...
vampirism.vamp_9.page.1:
\
...the weak minded would now not only let him drink his fill, but would also follow like faithful hounds...
\
\
\
 ...horror of all horrors, he lured five of them to specially prepared iron cages, topped with wood and with a gap at the front. He sealed them inside...
vampirism.vamp_9.page.2:
\
\
\
...he began feeding from each of them; mesmerising them first, then carefully he drank al he could without damaging any...
\
vampirism.vamp_9.page.3: At last he knew his blood was strong enough to replicate what She had done for him... ...left me weak, close to oblivion but I watched him fill a glass goblet and hand it to me... ...we both sat next to a coffin, far from the sun's gaze, "drink" is all he said...
witchery.add_page.9: 已将最后一页加至指南
witchery.use_with_needle: Use with 骨针 to fill
witchery:ritual/apply_ointment.tooltip: When imbued into broom-wood, the charm awakens. The air no longer resists, and the winds know thy name
witchery:ritual/bind_familiar.tooltip: Binds a familiar to the Player. A Familiar might aid in certain prospects of a witches life.
Binds spectral being to Effigies. Multiple binds might yield unusual effects.
witchery:ritual/charge_attuned.tooltip: Charges an 调谐之石 with 2000 祭坛 Power
Curses the poppets of the player
witchery:ritual/curse_of_overheating.too: Too heat sensitive to be in the desert
witchery:ritual/infuse_light.tooltip: Infuses the player with the 光之幽灵
witchery:ritual/infuse_necromancy.toolti: Infuse the player with 死灵魂剂
witchery:ritual/infuse_otherwhere.toolti: Infuses the player with the 他处之灵
witchery:ritual/manifestation.tooltip: Allows you to pass through spirit portals
witchery:ritual/necro_stone.tooltip: A stone as cold as the grave and thrice as silent. It is not carved, but called—formed beneath moon-lit skies where the veil is thin. Death clings to it like moss to tombstone.
witchery:ritual/push_mobs.tooltip: Pushes hostile mobs away from ritual center
witchery:ritual/resurrect_familiar.toolt: A bound familiar will be revived
witchery:ritual/rite_of_charging_infusio: Charges the power of an Infused player
witchery:ritual/summon_demon.tooltip: 在仪式中心召唤一只恶魔
witchery:ritual/summon_imp.tooltip: 在仪式中心召唤一只烈焰小鬼
witchery:ritual/summon_lightning.tooltip: 在仪式中心召唤一道闪电
witchery:ritual/summon_lightning_on_ways: Summons a Lightning Strike at bound 寻路石 location
witchery:ritual/summon_spectral_pig.tool: 在仪式中心召唤一只幽魂猪
witchery:ritual/summon_witch.tooltip: 在仪式中心召唤一个女巫
witchery:ritual/summon_wither.tooltip: 在仪式中心召唤一只凋灵
witchery:ritual/teleport_owner_to_waysto: Teleports the user to bound 寻路石 location
witchery:ritual/teleport_taglock_to_ways: Teleports the bound 巫媒 entity to bound 寻路石 location
